measured_by: CA parameter in the valenced credit-assignment RL model (V-LR, V-CA)
justification: “A credit assignment parameter (CA) evaluated the extent to which each PE selectively updates the expected value… Behavior was best fit by the credit assignment model with valenced CA parameters (V-LR, V-CA).”

measured_by: RSA beta coefficients for the identity representational dissimilarity matrix in prefrontal cortex searchlights
justification: “RSA allows us to directly measure the content and fidelity of evoked neural state representations during choice and feedback…we extracted single-trial coefficients…to create a neural representational dissimilarity matrix (RDM).”

measured_by: BOLD parametric modulation with trial-level prediction-error regressors
justification: “We conducted a whole brain parametric modulation to test the relationship between trial level PEs … and changes in the amplitude of the BOLD signal.”

measured_by: Investments in the iterative Trust Game
justification: “Participants played 60 trials of the Trust Game…Participants invested more money with the high return social partner compared to the bandit.”

measured_by: Investments in the matched one-arm bandit task
justification: “Participants made a series of monetary decisions with…bandits…Despite being perfectly matched…participants … invested less money with the low return bandit.”
